00043 #define p3PRI_NINFO     0x00000001  /* Ignore informational messages */
00044 /* Random number generation flags must be: 1=software, 2=hardware, 3=both */
00045 #define p3PRI_RNSW      0x00000002  /* Use software random number generation */
00046 #define p3PRI_RNHW      0x00000004  /* Use hardware random number generation */
00047 #define p3PRI_RNSHF     1           /* Shift value for random number generation */
00048 #define p3PRI_CLENABLE  0x00000010  /* Clustering state enabled */
00049 #define p3PRI_CLDBALRR  0x00000020  /* Load balancing = round robin */
00050 #define p3PRI_CLDBALBC  0x00000040  /* Load balancing = byte count */
00051 };
